repos_data.description: The Open Source kanban (built with Meteor). Keep variable/table/field names camelCase. For translations, only add Pull Request changes to wekan/i18n/en.i18n.json , other translations are done at https://app.transifex.com/wekan/wekan only.
Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite. It's implemented as a security-hardened web app package manager. | Actively sponsored by our friends at LambdaTest
